verbose_text: Activation of PTH1R with low concentrations of agonist results in a rapid increase in cyclic adenosine monophosphate (cAMP) mediated through coupling to G s and activation of adenylate cyclase [XREF_BIBR], whereas agonist concentrations in the micromolar range mediate phospholipase C (PLC) activation and IP 3 accumulation and the release of calcium from intracellular stores.
